May contain spoilers from Blood Lords **Source** [Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast](/Sources.aspx?ID=139) pg. 81 **Archetype** [Corpse Tender](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=196) **Prerequisites** [Command Corpse](/Feats.aspx?ID=3884) --- You grasp the mind of an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creature and temporarily wipe it as empty as a [zombie's](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=103) brain. You can target any undead with your divine innate [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) spell, not just [mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) undead. When you target one non-mindless undead creature with this spell, you can transform its effects. Instead of harm's normal effects, the target must attempt a Will save. **Critical Success** The target is unaffected.
**Success** The target is [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1 round.
**Failure** The target is stupefied 2 for 1 minute. While it is stupefied, you can use your Corpse Tender feats on the target as though it were mindless.
**Critical Failure** As failure, except the target is stupefied 3 for 10 minutes.
name: Imbue Mindlessness
